children\\*.description: Static child columns or content to render as the column header

align.description: The alignment of the column's contents relative to its allotted width

hideHeader.description: Whether the column should hide its header text

isRowHeader.description: Whether a column is a row header and should be announced by assistive technology during row navigation

textValue.description: A string representation of the column's contents, used for accessibility announcements

minWidth.description: The minimum width of the column

maxWidth.description: The maximum width of the column
